properties.name: SiteUrlPrefix
properties.caption: Site URL Prefix
properties.description: The prefix to use while creating sites in your tenant

properties.name: WeatherCity
properties.caption: City for Weather Forecasts
properties.description: The city for which you want to have weather forecasts in the home page of the Intranet

properties.name: StockSymbol
properties.caption: Stock Symbol
properties.description: The symbol of the stock to monitor in the home page of the Intranet (requires an AlphaVantage license key, or you can use 'demo' mode)

properties.name: lcid
properties.caption: Language
properties.description: The Locale ID of the language to use for provisioning the sites in the Intranet
